Currently I am working as a Software Engineer in ASA - one of the world's leading microfinance organizations in different projects. Skills: C#, ASP.NET, MVC, Web API, Web Forms, Windows Forms, Entity Framework, SQL Server, JavaScript, jquery, Crystal Reports, RDLC. Thank you! ðŸ’œ

projects.title: ASA Microfinance Management System
projects.description: ASA is one of the largest microfinance organization in the world. I have been working in the core microfinance management system for the past 3+ years. My responsibilities in this project include but are not limited to:      -Developing new modules for ASA Microfin Management System,      -Reviewing and Refactoring previously developed modules of ASA Microfin Management System      -Debugging and Fixing Bugs of previously developed modules of ASA Microfin Management System   -Developing supporting windows services for ASA Micorfin Management System as per requirement.

projects.title: Velocity FinCrime Solutions Suite
projects.description: Velocity FinCrime Solution Suite helps financial institutions comply with Anti-Money Laundering (AML), Bank Secrecy Act (BSA), and FATCA regulations with ease and simplicity. Things I did in this project:      -Developing new modules for Velocity FinCrime Solution Suite.     -Reviewing and Refactoring previously developed modules of Velocity FinCrime Solution Suite.     -Debugging and Fixing Bugs of previously developed modules of Velocity FinCrime Solution Suite.

projects.title: Income Tax Management System
projects.description: I have re-written a system for Tax management for the employees of ASA (having more than 26000 employees to date). This system was written in .NET 3.5 web forms. I converted the project to .NET Core (.NET 6). It was a complete rewrite of the existing solution with the latest technology available maintaining the clean architecture.
